==== jsdocDisallowedInTypescript.ts (30 errors) ====

    var ara: Array.<number> = [1,2,3];
    
    function f(x: ?number, y: Array.<number>) {
        return x ? x + y[1] : y[0];
    }
    function hof(ctor: function(new: number, string)) {
             ~~~
